snippet: KAYE--Judith S. The members of the Boards of the Fund and Committee for Modern Courts mourn the passing of the former Chief Judge of the State of New York, our fellow Board member, colleague, and outstanding advocate for judicial reform. May she rest in peace. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KAYE--Judith S. The members of the Boards of the Fund and Committee for Modern Courts mourn the passing of the former Chief Judge of the State of New York, our fellow Board member, colleague, and outstanding advocate for judicial reform. May she rest in peace. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KAYE, JUDITH S
